title: Drawing, "There was No Space in the Dressing Room for the Trunks", ca. 1924
medium: Brush and watercolor, charcoal on gray illustration board
signed: Lower left in charcoal: Everett Shinn / 1924
description: A scene in front of the stage. A man in frock-coat and top-hat is bending over a large open trunk. Behind him a woman holds a costume over her right arm. On the stage a man in a derby with a sheaf of papers.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "There was No Space in the Dressing Room for the Trunks", ca. 1924.
ca. 1924. Brush and watercolor, charcoal on gray illustration board. Gift of Everett Shinn. 1951-64-1.
